skills.name: GDPR Basics
skills.pattern: Data protection, privacy rights, applies to EU residents

skills.name: Personal Data
skills.pattern: Name, email, IP, location, any identifying information

skills.name: Lawful Basis
skills.pattern: Consent, contract, legal obligation, legitimate interest

skills.name: Consent
skills.pattern: Freely given, specific, informed, unambiguous, withdrawable

skills.name: Data Subject Rights
skills.pattern: Access, rectification, erasure, portability, objection

skills.name: Right to Erasure
skills.pattern: GDPR deletion requests, 30 days, cascading delete

skills.name: Data Portability
skills.pattern: Machine-readable format, JSON export, user download

skills.name: Privacy by Design
skills.pattern: Default privacy settings, minimal data, encryption

skills.name: Data Minimization
skills.pattern: Only collect what's needed, purpose limitation

skills.name: Breach Notification
skills.pattern: 72 hours to authority, notify affected users

skills.name: Cookie Consent
skills.pattern: Opt-in required, granular choices, remember preference

skills.name: Privacy Policy
skills.pattern: Clear language, what data, why, how long, rights

skills.name: Data Inventory
skills.pattern: Map all personal data, sources, storage, flows

skills.name: Retention Policies
skills.pattern: Define retention periods, auto-delete, legal holds

skills.name: Anonymization
skills.pattern: Can't re-identify, k-anonymity, differential privacy

skills.name: Pseudonymization
skills.pattern: Tokens instead of IDs, reversible with key

skills.name: Encryption at Rest
skills.pattern: AES-256, encrypted databases, key management

skills.name: Encryption in Transit
skills.pattern: HTTPS, TLS 1.3, certificate management

skills.name: Access Control
skills.pattern: Role-based, least privilege, audit logs

skills.name: PCI-DSS Basics
skills.pattern: 12 requirements, SAQ levels, cardholder data

skills.name: PCI Scope Reduction
skills.pattern: Use Stripe/Braintree, never touch card data

skills.name: Tokenization
skills.pattern: Store tokens not cards, Stripe tokens

skills.name: HIPAA Basics
skills.pattern: PHI protection, covered entities, BAA required

skills.name: BAA
skills.pattern: Agreement with vendors handling PHI

skills.name: SOC 2
skills.pattern: Security, availability, processing integrity, confidentiality, privacy

skills.name: SOC 2 Type 1 vs 2
skills.pattern: Type 1: point in time, Type 2: period of time

skills.name: Audit Logging
skills.pattern: Who accessed what when, immutable logs, retention

skills.name: Data Access Logs
skills.pattern: Log all PII access, justify access, review

skills.name: Data Residency
skills.pattern: EU data in EU, regional requirements, data sovereignty

skills.name: Cross-Border Transfer
skills.pattern: SCCs, adequacy decisions, transfer impact assessment
